## Showcasing plots {.tabset}

### Figure 1

```{r echo=FALSE}
p1 = ggplot(sb_locs_state, aes(x=population, y=n_stores, color=state)) + geom_point(alpha=0.8)
ggplotly(p1)
```

### Figure 2

```{r echo=FALSE}
p2 = sb_nutr |> ggplot(aes(x = Calories, fill = Category)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 50, alpha = 0.7) + 
  facet_wrap(~ Category) 

ggplotly(p2)
```
